results.title: Randomized, double-blind, controlled study of losartan in children with proteinuria.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: Twelve weeks of treatment with @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@ significantly reduced @<m>DISEASE_Proteinuria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuria@@@ compared with @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@/placebo: @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@ -35.8% (95% confidence interval: -27.6% to -43.1%) versus @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@/placebo 1.4% (95% confidence interval: -10.3% to 14.5%), P < or = 0.001.

citations.NLM: Webb NJ, Lam C, Loeys T, Shahinfar S, Strehlau J, Wells TG, Santoro E, Manas D, Gleim GW. Randomized, double-blind, controlled study of losartan in children with proteinuria. Clin J Am Soc Nephrol. 2010 Mar;5(3):417-24. PMID: 20089489
citations.BibTeX: @article{20089489, title={Randomized, double-blind, controlled study of losartan in children with proteinuria.}, author={Webb NJ and Lam C and Loeys T and Shahinfar S and Strehlau J and Wells TG and Santoro E and Manas D and Gleim GW}, journal={Clin J Am Soc Nephrol}, volume={5}, number={3}, pages={417-24}}

results.title: Efonidipine reduces proteinuria and plasma aldosterone in patients with chronic glomerulonephritis.
results.text_hl: The present study compared the @DISEASE_Chronic_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D002908 @@@chronic@@@ effects of @CHEMICAL_efonidipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C066425 @@@efonidipine@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Proteinuria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuria@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Glomerulonephritis @DISEASE_MESH:D005921 @@@chronic glomerulonephritis@@@.

results.title: Comparison between cilnidipine and amlodipine besilate with respect to proteinuria in hypertensive patients with renal diseases.
results.text_hl: This study compared @CHEMICAL_cilnidipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C065927 @@@cilnidipine@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ with respect to their effects on renal function and @<m>DISEASE_Proteinuria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuria@@@.

results.title: Beneficial action of candesartan cilexetil plus amlodipine or ACE inhibitors in chronic nondiabetic renal disease.
results.text_hl: Of note, the @<m>DISEASE_Proteinuria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuria@@@-sparing effect did not differ between the @CHEMICAL_candesartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:C081643 @@@candesartan@@@+ACEI group and the @CHEMICAL_candesartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:C081643 @@@candesartan@@@+@<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ group.

citations.NLM: Homma K, Hayashi K, Kanda T, Yoshioka K, Takamatsu I, Tatematsu S, Kumagai H, Wakino S, Saruta T. Beneficial action of candesartan cilexetil plus amlodipine or ACE inhibitors in chronic nondiabetic renal disease. J Hum Hypertens. 2004 Dec;18(12):879-84. PMID: 15295613

results.title: Successful management of proteinuria and systemic hypertension in a dog with renal cell carcinoma with surgery, telmisartan, and amlodipine.
results.text_hl: Successful management of @<m>DISEASE_Proteinuria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuria@@@ and systemic @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ in a @SPECIES_9615 @@@dog@@@ with @DISEASE_Carcinoma_Renal_Cell @DISEASE_MESH:D002292 @@@renal cell carcinoma@@@ with surgery, @CHEMICAL_Telmisartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077333 @@@telmisartan@@@, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@.

results.title: Antiproteinuric effect of cilnidipine in hypertensive Japanese treated with renin-angiotensin-system inhibitors - a multicenter, open, randomized trial using 24-hour urine collection.
results.text_hl: Our findings suggest that @CHEMICAL_cilnidipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C065927 @@@cilnidipine@@@ is superior to @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ in preventing the progression of @<m>DISEASE_Proteinuria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuria@@@ in @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ even undergoing treatment with RAS inhibitors.

citations.NLM: Miwa Y, Tsuchihashi T, Ohta Y, Tominaga M, Kawano Y, Sasaguri T, Ueno M, Matsuoka H. Antiproteinuric effect of cilnidipine in hypertensive Japanese treated with renin-angiotensin-system inhibitors - a multicenter, open, randomized trial using 24-hour urine collection. Clin Exp Hypertens. 2010;32(6):400-5. PMID: 20828221

results.title: Losartan and enalapril are comparable in reducing proteinuria in children.
results.text_hl: Here we assessed an open-label extension of a previous 3-month blinded trial, in which the efficacy and tolerability of @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@ was compared to placebo or @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ in 306 normotensive and @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ children with @<m>DISEASE_Proteinuria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuria@@@.

citations.NLM: Webb NJ, Shahinfar S, Wells TG, Massaad R, Gleim GW, Santoro EP, Sisk CM, Lam C. Losartan and enalapril are comparable in reducing proteinuria in children. Kidney Int. 2012 Oct;82(7):819-26. PMID: 22739977
citations.BibTeX: @article{22739977, title={Losartan and enalapril are comparable in reducing proteinuria in children.}, author={Webb NJ and Shahinfar S and Wells TG and Massaad R and Gleim GW and Santoro EP and Sisk CM and Lam C}, journal={Kidney Int}, volume={82}, number={7}, pages={819-26}}
